headline: Motorola Solutions SVX Earns Highest FedRAMP Authorization Level
summary: CHICAGO, February 10, 2026--Motorola Solutions (NYSE: MSI) today announced it received the highest-level security authorization from the Federal Risk and Authorization Management Program (FedRAMP®) for SVX – which serves as a body-worn assistant, converging secure voice, video and AI – and CommandCentral DEMS, its cloud-based digital evidence management system. FedRAMP High authorization affirms that both technologies have undergone rigorous testing and meet the U.S. federal government’s highest

headline: What To Expect From Motorola Solutions’s (MSI) Q4 Earnings
summary: Public safety technology company Motorola Solutions (NYSE:MSI) will be announcing earnings results this Wednesday after market close. Here’s what to expect.
